Bodhi Server APIs¶

fedmsg API¶

The fedmsgs bodhi sends are documented by the Fedora fedmsg project.

REST API¶

This section of the documentation describes Bodhi’s REST API. You can read about the various sections of the API by following the links below:

  • Builds
    • Build service at /builds/{nvr}
    • Builds service at /builds/
  • Comments
    • Comment service at /comments/{id}
    • Comments service at /comments/
    • Comments_Rss service at /rss/comments/
  • Composes
  • CSRF
    • Csrf service at /csrf
  • Markdown
    • Markdowner service at /markdown
  • Overrides
    • Override service at /overrides/{nvr}
    • Overrides service at /overrides/
    • Overrides_Rss service at /rss/overrides/
  • Packages
    • Packages service at /packages/
  • Releases
    • Release service at /releases/{name}
    • Releases service at /releases/
  • Updates
    • Update service at /updates/{id}
    • Update_Edit service at /updates/{id}/edit
    • Updates service at /updates/
    • Updates_Rss service at /rss/updates/
    • Update_Request service at /updates/{id}/request
    • Update_Waive_Test_Results service at /updates/{id}/waive-test-results
    • Update_Get_Test_Results service at /updates/{id}/get-test-results
  • Users
    • User service at /users/{name}
    • Users service at /users/
    • Users_Rss service at /rss/users/
